Text:
I tried for ages to get this to work on Windows and failed and my card has an omnipeek driver from Ralink too lol

even if you get this too work on windows only a very small rare amount of cards will work. Compared to using Aircrack on Linux where there is TONS of support for many wifi cards.

My advice to people new to Aircrack is learn how to set it up and install it on your Linux distrib.
OR Just use the Linux ver, Backtrack
It has Aircrack pre-installed. As well as many other similar or related tools, most of which are not available on windows.
le mieux c de creer un cd bootable ou une usb avec backtrak ou wifiway,tout est deja pret....ou bien tu a benji c un cd chinois avec le log mindwep qui est installe "pour les debutant" en linux
